uint32_t UXML2Node::getChildren ( UVector< xmlNodePtr > &  children,
const xmlChar *  name 
) const

Obtain the vector of child nodes. You may optionally obtain a vector of only the child nodes which have a certain name.

Parameters:
children The vector of child nodes.
name The names of the child nodes to get. If you do not specify a name, then the vector will contain all nodes, regardless of their names.

bool  recursive = true

Import node(s) from another document under this node, without affecting the source node.

Parameters:
node The node to copy and insert under the current node.
recursive Whether to import the child nodes also. Defaults to true.
Returns:
The newly-created node.

bool UXML2Node::setNameSpace ( const xmlChar *  ns_prefix = 0  )  [inline]

Set the namespace prefix used by the node.

If no such namespace prefix has been declared then this method return false.

Parameters:
ns_prefix The namespace prefix.
void UXML2Node::setNameSpaceDeclaration ( const char *  ns_uri,
const char *  ns_prefix = 0 
) [inline]

This adds a namespace declaration to this node which will apply to this node and all children.

Parameters:
ns_uri The namespace to associate with the prefix, or to use as the default namespace if no prefix is specified.
ns_prefix The namespace prefix. If no prefix is specified then the namespace URI will be the default namespace.
